title: How to Win Games and Beat People (Rebroadcast)
description: Games are as old as civilization itself, and some people think they have huge social value regardless of whether you win or lose. Tom Whipple is not one of those people. That’s why he consulted an army of preposterously overqualified experts to find the secret to winning any game.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
